title: Generative AI-Enabled Bilingual Science Education Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge of bilingual education, understanding of science curriculum content, and proficiency in mobile device utilization
context.additional_context: Strategy development for utilizing generative AI tools to strengthen bilingual education in science fields.

learning_goals: Establish design strategies for integrating generative AI tools (text generators, visual design tools, feedback systems) into bilingual science classes.
Possess the ability to create microlearning content applicable in mobile environments.
Develop and apply AI-based assessment rubrics for learner-customized bilingual science activities.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
